OpportunityObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

OpportunityObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

OpportunityObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Opportunity_Line_Data.description: Reference to an existing Opportunity Line for update only purposes.
The Opportunity Line Reference ID. This is the Opportunity Line unique identifier.

validation.validation: The Opportunity Line or Opportunity Line Reference ID is not valid for this opportunity. You can either update an existing Opportunity Line on this Opportunity or create a new Opportunity Line for this Opportunity.

Opportunity_Line_Data.description: Opportunity Line Product Description. The value provided does not need to match any Workday attribute.
Opportunity Line Product Code. Does not need to match any Workday attributes.
Opportunity Product Name. If Provided must match a Workday Sales Item Name.
Revenue Category. If provided, must match a Workday Revenue Category Name.

Invoicing_Schedule_Line_for_Opportunity_.description: Opportunity Line Invoicing Schedule Line Cost

validation.validation: Either a schedule amount or quantity must be provided and have a value greater than 0.
validation.description: Either a schedule amount or quantity must be provided and have a value greater than 0.

validation.validation: A Sales Item matching the Product Name: [Product Name] could not be found in Workday
validation.description: A Sales Item could not be found in Workday for the Product Code provided.

validation.validation: A Revenue Category matching the value: [Input] could not be found in Workday
validation.description: A Revenue Category could not be found in Workday for the name provided.

validation.validation: Opportunity Line Data contains duplicate Opportunity Line References or Line Reference IDs.  Each Opportunity Line should have a unique ID.
validation.description: Opportunity Line Data contains duplicate Opportunity Line References or Line Reference IDs.  Each Opportunity Line should have a unique ID.

validation.validation: The tenant does not have a default Revenue Category setup. The Opportunity Line needs to have a default Revenue Category, or a Opportunity Product Name or a Revenue Category.
validation.description: The tenant does not have a default Revenue Category setup. The Opportunity Line needs to have a default Revenue Category, or a Opportunity Product Name or a Revenue Category.

validation.validation: A Customer Invoice exists already for this Opportunity. The system can not update an Opportunity that is already Invoiced.  Please create a new Opportunity for the Customer and re-transmit.  Opportunity [Name]. Opportunity Reference ID: [ID]
validation.description: A Customer Invoice exists already for this Opportunity and is in a state that does not allow updates.  Please create a new Opportunity for the Customer.

validation.validation: Name is required on the initial add. Please correct the Opportunity and re-transmit. Opportunity Reference ID: [ID]
validation.description: Opportunity Name is required on the initial add.

validation.validation: If the currency and company are specified, the currency must match the default currency for the company.
Customer reference is for a customer that can be used as a basic worktag only.
validation.description: Customer reference is for a customer that can be used as a basic worktag only.

validation.validation: Prospect, Customer Request, or Customer is required when an Opportunity is Closed-Won. Please correct the Opportunity and re-transmit.  Opportunity: [Name]. Opportunity Reference ID: [ID]
validation.description: Prospect, Customer Request, or Customer is required when an Opportunity is Closed-Won.   Please correct the Opportunity and re-transmit.

validation.validation: The tenant does not have a default Company setup, nor is a valid Company provided.  Please use Tenant Setup to set the default Company or provide a Company Reference ID and re-transmit the Opportunity. Opportunity Name: [Name]. Opportunity Reference ID: [ID]
validation.description: The tenant does not have a default Company setup, nor is a valid Company provided.  Please use Tenant Setup to set the default Company or provide a Company Reference ID and re-transmit the Opportunity.

validation.validation: Opportunities that are Won must have associated Product Lines. Please correct the Opportunity and re-transmit. Opportunity [Name]. Opportunity Reference ID: [ID]
validation.description: Opportunities that are Won must have associated Product Lines. Please correct the Opportunity and re-transmit.
